Free Ebook Downloads for Making Profits

A number of web sites let the users download free ebooks which can surprisingly help you in earning good money. But, before you start any business, you must have a thorough knowledge of PLR rights, personal use rights, giveaway rights, and resell rights connected with these ebooks.

Some of the web sites offer you the PLR rights of the ebooks, which means you get the right to change the content in your own way or even change the name of the author. In this way, you get the right to sell the ebook with your own name as an expert on your own web site, or through email campaigns.

Personal use rights means that the content has to be used for your personal use only. You cannot resell it, give it away, or change the content. These kinds of books are usually used by users who want the books for reference purposes, as study-guides, or as learning material.

According to giveaway rights, you can give away ebooks without doing any changes in the content for a specific period. Reselling of the ebook is strictly prohibited and no profits are involved with these ebooks. Resell rights means selling the ebooks without doing any changes in the content, information or the name of the author. However, the best part is that you can keep the profits, which you get after the resell of the book.

After all this information, you must be wondering how to earn money with ebook downloads. Although giveaway rights or personal rights do not let you earn any monetary gains, they provide you with knowledge and information about new techniques. You can also display them on your web site to buy services. The best opportunity to earn money comes with PLR rights. You can do whatever changes you want in the book and by changing the book you can use the matter for your own web site. By selling them on a web site, the chances of getting big profits are enormous.

Before that you have to decide what niche you will be focusing on to sell your ebooks and make money . There are many niches that you can try on, some of the most famous being health, recreation (sports), self improvement, online business and careers and last but not the least family and relationships.

There are endless possibilities, you just need to make your mind and get started.

Importance Of E-books Resale Rights In Internet Marketing

Books have always been a man’s best friend, giving him company wherever he goes. The Internet has brought this friend closer to mankind in the form of ebooks whose notational growth forms electronic books.

Ebooks usually come in digital format and most of the ebooks are easily accessible, not only that, most ebooks now a days come free of cost. The convenience of ebooks is being recognized by libraries and universities as they're promoting the employment of ebooks over hard copies. Ebooks have also ventured into a new area besides being a source of information. It is also used as an internet marketing tool to get new clients and more visitors to the website.

One need not be an author in order to sell his ebooks. With the concept of ebooks resale rights, one will easily sell books written by somebody else. The ebooks resale rights refer to the rights given away by the author to others who in return sell the ebooks to earn profits. It is a win-win scenario for both: the vendor and also the author. The author gains as he earns through the license fee that he gets on giving the ebooks resale rights. The customer of the rights gains because he doesn’t need to pay any royalty to the author and will keep the profits made from selling somebody else’s work.

There are some pros and cons related to the ebooks resale rights. Starting with the pros, it is a win-win scenario for both the author and the customer of the rights where both the parties are gaining. However the flip side of the resale rights is that as there may be similar patrons shopping for the rights, there could be too many people selling the identical book, thus bringing down profit margins.

One should also take care when obtaining ebooks resale rights as there are various ebooks and websites that have nearly no viewership or readership, but still the author puts the ebook rights on sale for a hefty license fee. Putting money in such rights could be suicidal in terms of on investment. Hence choice of websites and branded ebooks ought to be done with care and these should be authenticated for reliability.

There are various types of resale rights such as master resale rights, personal label rights, and the standard resale rights. By obtaining the master resale rights, the client has the authority to sell the ebook and its rights as well. Therefore these rights provide the buyer the authority to sell and provide his customers the right to sell. The quality resale rights provide the first buyer the right to resell the ebook, but nothing further. Personal label rights are the strongest of the rights. These rights give their buyers the right to resell plus re-brand the ebook to be sold under his name.

Any of these resale rights have their own benefits and drawbacks. Thus before buying any resale rights, it is essential that one should scrutinize all of these and create the selection only once being satisfied. It is conjointly important to select the ebooks that are to be resold, with care.

The Best Ways To Download Ebooks

Books are said to be one’s best friend and currently with the Internet revolution, books are available with the click of the mouse. Electronic books, better referred to as ebooks, are books in a digital format. These ebooks are actually HTML executable files that can be downloaded on to a computer to be run anytime afterwards.

The HTML files created for the purpose of being an ebook will be written specifically for the purpose or may be obtained from a website. The HTML file on being created is compiled to become an .exe file which when downloaded, installs itself on the user’s computer.

Ebooks are interactive books as they need search capabilities; they are protected and have content in the form of graphics, videos, forms, links, and tags. They're not only for the purpose of information, but are increasingly being employed as a marketing tool. With the concept of viral marketing applied to ebooks, these have now become self expanding and will reach several users by just being giving away once. Branded Ebooks will also be used to advertise products or services and web pages, either one’s own or someone else’s.

To be able to download ebooks, it's necessary that the user has the specified reader that is able to make the download easy and the ebook readable. Most of the ebooks are also written as PDF files. Therefore to download a .PDF ebook, the user should have the Adobe Reader put in on his computer. The publisher may have given the ebook by anyone of 3 ways-that's, as a download on a web page, as a link in an email, or as an attachment in an email. To download ebooks by any of these methods, here are the rules in short:

Web page downloads

This is a straightforward means through which ebooks can be easily downloaded. When the ebook is purchased, the publisher directs the user to a web page that displays a .PDF link. The webpage might urge the user to start the download by clicking on the graphic icon depicting the same. But instead of clicking, right clicking and saving the target or link, depending on the browser, the ebook is saved on the computer.

Email links

The publisher might also send the ebook as a direct link in an email. This is kind of like opening and downloading the ebook as the web page downloading method. The difference is that the user accesses the ebook through his email account rather than the webpage directly.

Email attachment

There might be publishers who send their ebooks as an attachment in an email. But the issue with this methodology is that the spam filters prohibit the mail from reaching the user’s inbox. So the ebook might be within the filtered spam, and if it is not there, the publisher has to be contacted again.

Therefore it's simple to download ebooks by any of these given methods. Once downloaded, the ebooks can be read repeatedly. With many of the ebooks being free to download, there is ample material for all to peruse.

Brandable Ebooks To Get Website Traffic

Digital books present on the Internet are called as ebooks. They're turning into a convenient way to get access to valuable data from the Internet. Besides, they're now giving valuable help as tools for making money and bringing in visitors to websites. It may sound strange that an ebook will be used for selling, but it is true. The concept of ebooks being used as an Internet marketing tool is easy to understand.

There are thousands of ebooks accessible on the Internet. To use them as a marketing tool, the authors have put certain ‘tags’ in them that make these ebooks brandable and these brandable ebooks are used to direct traffic to a specific website.

Here’s how the concept works:

1. The ebook is written by an author with an affiliate link to one or many of his products or services. The reader can later change the original affiliate link to link of his choice.

2. If the links changed by the readers are to two tiered programs, the author earns the second tier commission when the ebook is referred by other affiliates.

3. Some brandable ebooks also let their visitors rebrand the book as their own by changing the name and website details.

So with the concept of viral marketing , the ebooks serve the purpose of skyrocketing sales through preexisting social networks. It’s a known fact that if a person likes a product or service he will ask others to use the same. This word of mouth goes on and the product or service is sold by the user itself. It’s the same with brandable ebooks.

Once the book that has brandable features in it's liked by somebody, it's recommended to other people as well. It’s a win-win situation for both the author and the visitor as the chain thus continuous to grow. The author benefits as the sale of his ebook will increase due to branding and the visitor benefits by way of obtaining adequate information and additionally the power to rebrand the ebook as his own.

For ebooks to be a source of traffic generation and revenue, they need to be good, have unique content, and be able to attract the visitor enough to make him recommend the book to somebody else. So careful creating and writing of the book is very important.

The ebook must be informative, should contain useful and practical content, and be persuasive enough to be suggested further.

Brandable ebooks can be written in HTML format or PDF format. For either of the sorts of format, a appropriate compiler is needed. The mostly used format is the HTML format for that the HTML compiler is used. But, the PDF format is professional, trendy, and user-friendly. Moreover it's appropriate for Macs and PCs alike.

Thus brandable ebooks, with the viral marketing concept, brings in increased traffic and revenue for a website. Moreover, it is a way to market one’s own or someone else’s products or services.
